title: LIMIT
markdown_content:
## Limiting Results with LIMIT

The `LIMIT` clause restricts how many rows are returned. This is useful when you only need a sample of the data or the top N results.

### Syntax

```sql
SELECT column1, column2 FROM table_name
LIMIT n;
```

### Combining with ORDER BY

A common pattern is to get the "top 3" of something by combining `ORDER BY` and `LIMIT`:

```sql
SELECT * FROM products ORDER BY price DESC LIMIT 3;
```

This returns the 3 most expensive products.
